name: Dread(Ful)
description:
Hey, welcome to Dread(ful). The name really does it justice as it's pretty bad but I'm glad I was able to submit something in time.

Controls:

WASD to Move

Dice:

1: normal

2: lights out (sound fx is pretty loud so watch out)

3: statue movement

4: lights out and statue movement

Goal: find the Key and bring it back to the door to escape.
